Message.Title: The Ebay Experience
Message.Msg: Ebay is getting worse all the time. More and more demented scammers offering overpriced junk. $45 looks like an excellent selling opportunity. No returns, no exchanges. Of course, I have no way to test my theory, so it is offered AS IS.
